entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 09:45 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
